ygData.subject: Re: Body Recovery
ygData.msgSnippet: Be wary of the painbringer, I would like two also, but the spell it casts is AREA AFFECT, not sure how large an area but it will attract attention.
ygData.messageBody:
Be wary of the painbringer, I would like two also, but the spell it casts is
AREA AFFECT, not sure how large an area but it will attract attention.

> ----------
> From: Jones, Brian[SMTP:brian.jones@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Saturday, June 05, 1999 3:41 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Body Recovery
>
> From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>
>
> Umm....I believe she was being facetious. You know, funny,
> silly, etc.
>
> Angarth, Clan Anstruther, Warrior of the 15th Tier
> "Periissem ni periisem"
>
>
> > ----------
> > From: Andrew Palmer[SMTP:apalmer@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com

> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com

> >

> > attempt at getting you the painbringer have no idea what you could give
> > them at 16 to get you that sword..
> >
> > On Fri, 4 Jun 1999, Patricia Halas wrote:
> >
> > > From: Patricia Halas <patty_halas@...>
> > >
> > > Ahh, understand I risk losing my equipment if the world crashes while
> I
> > am
> > > camping and my body is left in the open desert (or at the inn in Oasis
> > as it
> > > is now), but I must trust in the will of my lord and protector Rallos
> > Zek.
> > >
> > > When I was a young warrior of the 5th Rank I fell down the hole on the
> > top
> > > level of black burrow and was forced to leave my body and all my brand
> > new
> > > patchwork armor. No problem, Rallos Zek gave me the power to start
> anew
> > and
> > > rebuild my weath until I now have half banded and half ring mail, a
> > combine
> > > long sword, a fine steel long sword and a fine steel 2H sword.
> > >
> > > SH** - It is going to take a whole lot longer to get that stuff back
> if
> > I
> > > lose it. Better recover my body at lunch.
> > >
> > > btw: Will someone please help me get painbringer? tehehehe, ok, I
> know
> > a
> > > 16th rank warrior wont last long in Sol B, but I will tag along :)
> > >
